title: Skirting Mintaka: Adventure is in the Next Galaxy
description: In an attempt to evade authorities a crew of "Freelance Merchants" commandeer a modified space going vessel and plot a course to the safest, neighboring galaxy, our own. Upon landing on the third planet from the sun the ship's captain enlists a new member for her crew. After reaching safety in her own galaxy Bonnie Anne, learns that her new crew member and a link to her history are one and the same. Chasing her all the way is an enemy who will stop at nothing, breaking any rule to catch her.
author: Harold Eugene Covey Jr.
